translation.en: [narrator] It begins like this.
Two billion years ago, an amoeba.
translation.it: Due miliardi di anni fa, un'ameba.

translation.en: Wait, let's... Let's back up. I've skipped too many connections.
translation.it: Un attimo... torniamo indietro. Ho saltato troppe connessioni.

translation.en: Out of nothing, in an instant... everything.
translation.it: Dal nulla, in un istante... tutto.

translation.en: An infinite cosmic orgy of matter and energy,
translation.it: Un'infinita orgia cosmica di materia ed energia,

translation.en: rubbing, bumping, and grinding together.
There would be no galaxies, no suns, no planets,
translation.it: Non esisterebbe nessuna galassia, nessun sole o pianeta

translation.en: no life without collisions of heavenly bodies.
translation.it: e nemmeno la vita, senza collisioni tra corpi celesti.

translation.en: Back to our amoeba.
It engulfs a bacterium with unique powers, and... voilà...
translation.it: Avvolse un batterio dai poteri unici, e... voilà.

translation.en: Earth's first photosynthesis-enabled organism.
translation.it: Il primo organismo terrestre capace di compiere la fotosintesi.

translation.en: Maybe it was chance.
Maybe it was inevitable.
This one changed amoeba
becomes the ancestor of every living plant on Earth,
translation.it: diventò la progenitrice di ogni pianta vivente sulla Terra,

translation.en: which in turn floods the planet with oxygen...
translation.it: che a sua volta arricchì l'atmosfera di ossigeno,

translation.en: paving the way for every other form of life we know,
translation.it: preparando il terreno alle altre forma di vita a noi note,

translation.en: leading to more souls, more connections,
translation.it: il che portò ad altre anime, connessioni

translation.en: and therefore more new worlds branching outward from the first.
translation.it: e quindi a nuovi mondi in espansione a partire dal primo.

translation.en: These forces of nature, when they converge,
translation.it: Quando si uniscono, queste forze della natura,

translation.en: be they astronomical collisions, biological unions,
translation.it: che siano collisioni tra corpi celesti o unioni biologiche,

translation.en: demonstrate the infinite potential of our connections.
translation.it: dimostrano l'infinito potenziale delle nostre connessioni.

translation.en: This truth also extends to the human heart.
translation.it: Questa verità si può applicare anche al cuore umano.

translation.en: Pack of Stuttons.
No offense, but how are you gonna pay for these?
translation.it: Senza offesa, ma come intendi pagare?

translation.en: I'm gonna use an ad Buddy to cover this purchase.
translation.it: Userò Ad Buddy per coprire la spesa.

translation.en: Those assholes record client conversations.
translation.it: Quegli stronzi registrano le conversazioni coi clienti.

translation.en: National Database of Desires.
The businessmen, ever hear of it?
They know you better than you know you.
translation.it: Ti conoscono meglio di quanto conosca te stesso.

translation.en: -Okay. -It's not a conspiracy,
just a conspiracy theory.
[narrator] Hypothesis:
all souls are on a quest to connect.
translation.it: tutte le anime sono alla ricerca di una connessione.

translation.en: Corollary:
our minds have no awareness of this quest.
translation.it: la nostra mente non è consapevole di questa ricerca.

translation.en: Did you know that most quarters have been swallowed and defecated by a human?
translation.it: Sapevi che molte monete da 25 centesimi sono state ingoiate e defecate?

translation.en: [narrator] Hypothesis: all the worlds that almost were
translation.it: Ipotesi: tutti i mondi che sono quasi esistiti

translation.en: matter just as much as the world we're in.
translation.it: contano esattamente quanto il mondo in cui viviamo.

translation.en: Corollary:
these hidden worlds cause us great pain.
translation.it: questi mondi nascosti ci causano molto dolore.

translation.en: [man] ...no wallet, no shoes.
No idea how I even really got to Poland in the first place.
translation.it: Non sapevo nemmeno come fossi finito in Polonia.

translation.en: Bro, I'm telling you,
this was seriously such a crazy situation.
translation.it: che era davvero una situazione assurda.

translation.en: Th... From Poland... I was in...
I had no idea... I had no idea how I got there.
translation.it: Non avevo idea... Non avevo idea di come ci fossi finito.

translation.en: [narrator] Camaraderie, communion,
family, friendship, love, what have you.
We're lost without connection.
[audio billboard] ...long-distance relationships are tough. Thank you, Friend Proxy.
translation.it: TUTTO È PIÙ BUONO QUANDO SI È INSIEME

translation.en: [narrator] It's quite terrible... to be alone.
Put simply, my goal is to eradicate all...
translation.it: In pratica, la mia missione è di eliminare...

translation.en: unnecessary and inefficient forms of human pain.
translation.it: ...le forme inutili e inefficienti di dolore negli esseri umani.

translation.en: Forever.
We must evolve past our suffering.
translation.it: Dobbiamo evolvere oltre la nostra sofferenza.

translation.en: It's trash, not a handout. Let's move it.
What are you, a cop?
Not much of a difference authority-wise. Let's go.
translation.it: Il livello di autorità è simile. Vattene.

translation.en: [narrator] My research into this matter is... of course, ongoing.
translation.it: Le mie ricerche in questo campo sono, ovviamente, in corso.

translation.en: [man] The witness has already been sworn in.
translation.it: Il testimone ha già fatto giuramento.

translation.en: Mr. Milgrim, can you state for the court
translation.it: Signor Milgrim, può descrivere al tribunale

translation.en: your relationship with the defendant, Mr. Jed Milgrim?
translation.it: il tipo di relazione che ha con l'imputato, Jed Milgrim?

translation.en: He's, um...
-He's my brother. -[man] Thank you.
Have you ever been arrested?
-No. -[man] Are you married?
-No. -[man] Children?
[man] And can you tell us about the psychotic break
translation.it: È può parlarci della crisi psicotica

translation.en: that you experienced roughly ten years ago?
translation.it: che ha subito all'incirca 10 anni fa?

translation.en: -Really? -[man] I'm just asking.
translation.it: - Sul serio? - È una semplice domanda.

translation.en: That's how they're gonna start? Dad, come on.
It doesn't necessarily mean that it'll be like that in the trial, Owen,
translation.it: Non significa necessariamente che accadrà al processo, Owen,

translation.en: but, uh, sometimes prosecutors, they...
translation.it: ma a volte, il pubblico ministero...

translation.en: They try, uh, atypical inroads...
to crack you.
That's why we, uh... We have to prep for the unexpected.
translation.it: Ecco perché dobbiamo prepararci a qualsiasi evenienza.

translation.en: Can you resume, please?
Have you ever been hospitalized for mental illness?
translation.it: È mai stato ricoverato per problemi mentali?

translation.en: Yes, ten years ago.
Please explain what happened.
[Owen] I was hospitalized...
and medicated...
and...
that was the last episode I had.
translation.it: ...quello è stato il mio ultimo episodio.

translation.en: Wasn't the nature of this psychosis delusional?
translation.it: Questa psicosi non era di natura illusoria?

translation.en: That you sometimes thought you saw your brother when he wasn't there?
translation.it: Cioè a volte vedeva suo fratello quando in realtà non c'era?

translation.en: [Owen] Not exactly.
Just say no.
Then what was the nature of this psychosis?
translation.it: Allora di che natura era questa psicosi?

translation.en: [sighs] Owen, don't you think that your mental illness
translation.it: Owen, non credi che la tua malattia mentale

translation.en: should disqualify you from testifying as a witness on your brother's behalf?
translation.it: dovrebbe impedirti di testimoniare a favore di tuo fratello?

translation.en: Look, there's only one question here that really matters.
translation.it: C'è solo una domanda che conta.

translation.en: Owen, do you know what is real?
One hundred percent.
I'm compos mentis.
[woman] Welcome to New York.
And this is Statue of Extra Liberty.
translation.it: Questa è la Statua dell'extra libertà.

translation.en: Statue of Extra Liberty. Okay.
[man] How'd the trial prep go for a naughty brother?
translation.it: Com'è andato il processo di prova del fratello discolo?

translation.en: Did you tell 'em about me?
You're not supposed to be here.
[man] Good. You're still using the code words,
translation.it: - Non dovresti essere qui. - Bene. Usi ancora le parole in codice,

translation.en: even though I am technically invisible.
Owen, this week must be a doozy for you, huh?
translation.it: Owen, questa settimana dev'essere straordinaria per te, eh?

translation.en: You thought you were rid of me, but I have new information.
translation.it: Credevi di esserti liberato di me, ma ho nuove informazioni.

translation.en: This time I know.
You've been chosen to save the world.
translation.it: Sei stato scelto per salvare il mondo.

translation.en: You're gonna be a hero.
I don't want this. I don't want it.
translation.it: Non voglio tutto questo. Non lo voglio.

translation.en: I don't want this.
The details of the mission will be delivered to you by an agent, a woman.
translation.it: - No. - I dettagli della missione ti saranno recapitati da un'agente donna.

translation.en: You'll know her when you see her, trust me.
translation.it: La riconoscerai quando la vedrai, fidati.

translation.en: Just make contact with her.
The pattern is the pattern.
She'll reach you for further instructions!
[yells] Don't fuck this up!
[automated voice] Welcome. Please make a selection to begin.
translation.it: Benvenuto. Per cominciare, digiti la sua scelta.

translation.en: You selected single ride.
How will you pay?
You selected credit.
translation.it: Ha scelto la carta di credito.

translation.en: Please swipe now.
Declined. Insufficient funds.
Would you like to use an ad Buddy to add funds?
translation.it: Vuole utilizzare un Ad Buddy per aggiungere fondi?

translation.en: Yes or no?
Welcome.
[Ad Buddy] Okay, Mr. Milgrim, I'm gonna need your attention.
translation.it: Ok, signor Milgrim, mi presti attenzione.

translation.en: "When tragedy strikes others,
it's sometimes hard to know what to do until now..." Owen.
translation.it: può essere difficile sapere cosa fare. Ora non più... Owen.

translation.en: "Daddy's Home. Consider becoming a temporary volunteer mail-order husband
translation.it: 'Papà è a casa'. Puoi diventare un marito postale temporaneo

translation.en: and changing the lives of a heartbroken family in your region."
translation.it: e cambiare la vita di una famiglia in lutto nella tua regione."

translation.en: Okay, well, up next,
we got something called Neberdine Pharmaceuticals.
"Good afternoon, Owen.
Did you know that your rent comprises 87.2 percent of your annual income?"
translation.it: Sapevi che il tuo affitto ammonta all'87,2 percento del tuo introito annuale?"

translation.en: Is that actually true?
-I just moved into my own place. -[Ad Buddy] Manhattan these days...
translation.it: Mi sono appena trasferito in un posto tutto mio. Manhattan, oggigiorno...

translation.en: I'm over in an underground warehouse unit.
translation.it: Io sto in un posto ricavato da un magazzino sotterraneo.

translation.en: Hoboken.
-I actually live in Roosevelt Island. -Okay, well...
translation.it: Io abito a Roosevelt Island. Ok, beh....

translation.en: Uh, let's see. Oh-ho-ho.
"A catastrophic interruption in your professional life,
translation.it: "Una catastrofica interruzione della tua vita professionale,

translation.en: like a furlough, could ruin you.
translation.it: come un congedo non pagato, potrebbe mandarti in rovina.

translation.en: Ever thought about supplementing your income with pharmaceutical testing?"
translation.it: Hai mai pensato di arrotondare partecipando a un trial farmaceutico?

translation.en: Friend Proxy.
"Tired of spending your time and energy making friends?"
translation.it: "Stufo di sprecare tempo ed energia per cercare amici?"

translation.en: [sales rep] And that is why Daddy's Home is happy to welcome you, Mr. Milgrim.
translation.it: Ecco perché Papà è a casa è lieta di accoglierla, sig. Milgrim.

translation.en: [Owen] And I'd have to cover relocation costs?
translation.it: E dovrei coprire io le spese di trasferimento?

translation.en: [sales rep] And inherit any potential debt of the deceased.
translation.it: E prendersi carico di ogni eventuale debito del defunto.

translation.en: That doesn't make sense.
[sales rep] So, that's a yes?
To what?
[sales rep] It makes perfect sense.
-We are offering you heroism. -[man] So this is your office area.
translation.it: - Le offriamo eroismo. - Qui è dove lavora.

translation.en: Again, it's a question of commitment.
[Owen] Your ad is misleading,
'cause you refer to it as a volunteer opportunity,
translation.it: perché parlate di un'opportunità di fare volontariato,

translation.en: but in the end I'd have to pay.
translation.it: mentre alla fine dovrei pure pagare.

translation.en: [sales rep] But think about what you'd be getting. -A wife, lonely, in need. -[Owen] Yeah.
translation.it: Ma pensi a cosa riceverebbe. Una moglie bisognosa e tutta sola.

translation.en: [man] Rozo did the anonymous hammerhead from the top down
translation.it: Rozo ha esaminato il personale in ordine gerarchico

translation.en: and came back with a 12-bullet short-termer.
translation.it: e ha creato una lista di 12 impiegati da congedare.

translation.en: -When? -[man] Well, they randomized the pattern.
translation.it: - Quando? - Varia a seconda della persona.

translation.en: We've sent out 30 memos on it since this morning.
translation.it: Da stamattina hanno inviato 30 promemoria in merito.

translation.en: Um, so this furlough, how long does it last?
-It's temporary. -[Owen] Right.
So... when am I back?
Oh, I don't know. I was kidding. It's probably permanent.
translation.it: Non lo so. Scherzavo. Probabilmente è definitivo.

translation.en: I was using your kind of humor,
translation.it: Mi ero ispirato al tuo umorismo,

translation.en: when you say something you don't mean and nobody laughs.
translation.it: quando dici qualcosa a casaccio e nessuno ride.

translation.en: It's... Yeah, it's okay. I'll just...
I'll just dip into my savings.
Bye.
[man] Okay, Owen.
-Do you know what I want to do? -[Owen] Yes.
[man] Are you sure you know what I want to do?
translation.it: Sicuro di sapere cosa voglio fare?

translation.en: [Owen] Yes.
[man] The way this deprogramming works, it's not an overnight fix.
translation.it: Questa deprogrammazione non ha effetto istantaneo.

translation.en: You have to listen to it like a mantra.
If you start feeling paranoid, you play this tape right away, okay?
translation.it: Ai primi sintomi di paranoia ascolta subito la registrazione, ok?

translation.en: [man] Now, stop me when I say something that's not true.
translation.it: Interrompimi quando dico qualcosa di falso.

translation.en: The world sends you messages.
translation.it: Il mondo ti manda dei messaggi.

translation.en: [Owen] Yes.
[man] Words are often code words, or pass phrases for important secrets.
translation.it: Le parole sono spesso in codice o parole d'ordine d'importanti segreti.

translation.en: [Owen] Yes.
[man] You're visited by a brother no one else in your family is aware of.
translation.it: Ricevi visite da un fratello sconosciuto alla tua famiglia.

translation.en: A facsimile of your brother Jed.
translation.it: Una copia di tuo fratello Jed.

translation.en: -[Owen] Yes. -[man] He sends you messages.
Instructions for important missions you must accomplish.
translation.it: Istruzioni di importanti missioni che devi compiere.

translation.en: [Owen] To see the deeper truth.
translation.it: Per vedere la realtà più profonda.

translation.en: [man] He tells you you're meant to do something big,
translation.it: Ti dice che sei destinato a fare qualcosa di grandioso,

translation.en: something that matters to the world,
and that you're not meant to do it alone.
translation.it: e che non devi farlo da solo.

translation.en: All you need is a partner.
[Owen] Yes.
[audio billboard] You made a promise to me, and you made a promise to yourself.
translation.it: Mi hai fatto una promessa e l'hai fatta anche a te stesso.

translation.en: You promised we'd golf together in Hilton Head.
translation.it: Avevi promesso che avremmo giocato a golf insieme a Hilton Head.

translation.en: [man] You sense danger all around you, but you stay disciplined.
translation.it: Avverti pericolo intorno a te, ma rimani disciplinato.

translation.en: A fight's coming.
Something even bigger than this world.
translation.it: Qualcosa ancora più grande di questo mondo.

translation.en: Possibly extending to multiple galaxies.
translation.it: Che forse si estenderà a galassie multiple.

translation.en: -[elevator] Fourth floor. Thank you. -[Owen] Yes.
Hello, Mrs. Finkelstein.
Fuck off, Donovan.
It's, uh, Owen.
-Owen Milgrim... -[Finkelstein] Fuck off, Donovan.
Never mind.
Good.
Does it feel good to be heard?
[man] Does it feel good to know that you're not alone with this information?
translation.it: È bello sapere che non sei l'unico a conoscere queste informazioni?

translation.en: [Owen] Yeah.
[man] Will you complete your mission?
[Owen] Maybe.
[man] Am I a trusted messenger?
[Owen] Yes.
translation.it: - Sì. - Bene. Ecco le istruzioni vere e proprie.

translation.en: [man] Good. Then here are your real instructions.
translation.it: - Sì. - Bene. Ecco le istruzioni vere e proprie. NIENTE RIMEDIO SOLO GIOIA

translation.en: Repeat after me.
There is no pattern.
[Owen] There is no pattern.
[man] I am vulnerable, but I am not stupid.
translation.it: Sono vulnerabile, ma non sono stupido.

translation.en: [Owen] I'm vulnerable, but I'm not stupid.
translation.it: Sono vulnerabile, ma non sono stupido.

translation.en: But I will seek out the people in my life that care about me.
translation.it: Ma cercherò coloro che sono affezionati a me.

translation.en: [Owen] I will seek out the people in my life who care about me.
translation.it: Ma cercherò coloro che sono affezionati a me.

translation.en: I am not the chosen one.
[Owen] I am not the chosen one.
-The voices aren't real. -[clattering]
-[Owen] The voices aren't real. -The voices aren't real.
translation.it: - Le voci non sono vere. - Le voci non sono vere.

translation.en: The voices are just noise.
-[Owen] The voices are just noise. -The voices are just noise.
translation.it: - Le voci sono solo rumore. - Sono solo rumore.

translation.en: I am just a guy with a vivid imagination.
translation.it: Sono solo un uomo dalla vivida immaginazione.

translation.en: [Owen] I'm just a guy with a vivid imagination.
translation.it: Sono solo un uomo dalla vivida immaginazione.

translation.en: I will most likely not be the savior of our galaxy.
translation.it: È praticamente certo che non sarò io a salvare la galassia.

translation.en: Hello?
[man, distorted] I've got a package from Neberdine Pharmaceutical Biotech
translation.it: Ho un pacco da parte della Neberdine Pharmaceutical Biotech

translation.en: for an Owen Milgrim.
What?
[man] I've got a package. Your name.
translation.it: Ho un pacco col suo nome.

translation.en: Hello?
[woman] Hi, Owen. Did you get what I sent you?
translation.it: Ciao, Owen. Hai ricevuto quello che ti ho spedito?

translation.en: [Owen] How did you...?
[woman] I've just been informed that you qualify as a hero candidate.
translation.it: Mi hanno appena detto che hai i requisiti di un candidato eroe.

translation.en: -What does that mean? -[woman] It's a term we use
translation.it: Cosa significa? È un termine che usiamo per coloro scelti appositamente

translation.en: for those who've been specifically selected for one of our studies.
translation.it: È un termine che usiamo per coloro scelti appositamente per uno dei nostri studi.

translation.en: You're a very desirable individual to us, Owen.
translation.it: Sei una persona altamente desiderabile per noi, Owen.

translation.en: I've never seen B.N. over-ratios like this before.
translation.it: Non ho mai visto dei parametri B.N. simili.

translation.en: What does a hero candidate do? [woman] Exactly the things they were born to.
translation.it: - Cosa fa un candidato eroe? - Le cose che fa per sua natura.

translation.en: In your case, helping us treat maladies
translation.it: Nel tuo caso, aiutarci a curare malattie

translation.en: ranging from sluggishness and depression,
translation.it: che vanno da svogliatezza e depressione

translation.en: to I.B.S, to popcorn problems and irrational fears.
translation.it: a colon irritabile, problemi di popcorn e paure irrazionali.

translation.en: "Popcorn problems"?
[woman] Prostate problems, yes.
Oh, I thought you...
[woman] We'll give you all the details when you come in.
translation.it: Ti daremo tutti i dettagli quando arrivi.

translation.en: So, we'll see you on Monday?
♪ Someday you're gonna feel lonely ♪
♪ Someday you're gonna feel blue ♪
♪ Someday you'll long for me only ♪
translation.it: Un giorno sentirai solo la mia mancanza

translation.en: Good evening, Mr. Milgrim.
Everyone is on the patio for the recital.
translation.it: Sono tutti sul patio per il recital.

translation.en: Thank you.
♪ Someday you're gonna feel weary ♪
♪ You'll grieve when I'm far away ♪
♪ Then you'll be missin' My huggin' and my kissin' ♪
translation.it: Poi ti mancheranno I miei abbracci e baci

translation.en: ♪ You'll remember what I say ♪
♪ You'll never know The good fellow I've been ♪
translation.it: Non conoscerai mai Il bravo ragazzo che sono

translation.en: -♪ Until I've gone away ♪ -♪ Till I've gone away ♪ ♪ Gone away ♪
translation.it: - Finché non sarò andato via - Finché non sarò andato via

translation.en: ♪ You're bound to miss The little things that I did ♪
translation.it: Vedrai, ti mancheranno Le piccole cose che facevo

translation.en: -♪ I did ♪ -♪ For you each day ♪
translation.it: - Che facevo ogni giorno per te - Ogni giorno per te

translation.en: -♪ You're gonna yearn ♪ -♪ You will be yearning ♪
-♪ For my returning ♪ -♪ For my returning ♪
translation.it: - Per il mio ritorno - Per il mio ritorno

translation.en: -♪ You're bound to miss me ♪ -♪ You're bound to miss me ♪
translation.it: - Vedrai, ti mancherò - Vedrai, ti mancherò

translation.en: -♪ You'll long to kiss me ♪ -♪ You'll long to kiss me ♪
translation.it: - Avrai voglia di baciarmi - Avrai voglia di baciarmi

translation.en: ♪ You'll never know The good fellow I've been ♪
translation.it: Non conoscerai mai Il bravo ragazzo che sono

translation.en: -♪ Until I've gone away ♪ -♪ Until I've gone away ♪
♪ Till I've gone away ♪
Where does she sleep when she stays over?
translation.it: Dove dorme quando passa la notte qui?

translation.en: [Belle] This one?
Yeah, she's your sister, right?
Or is she a secret agent?
How did you know?
[whispering] Because I have super-secret sources
at a super-secret agency.
Don't tell anyone.
Supper's ready.
Okay, Mom.
I was completely baffled.
You know, I left for school.
translation.it: Ero uscito per andare a scuola.

translation.en: Ernie was fine, and then, you know, the food was in the bowl.
translation.it: Ernie stava bene. C'era cibo nella scodella,

translation.en: The water was there, cage was locked up,
translation.it: acqua e la gabbia era ben chiusa.

translation.en: and I get back from basketball practice,
-and he's just gone, absolutely... -The great gerbil escape artist.
translation.it: - era sparito. Assolutamente... - Il criceto grande artista della fuga.

translation.en: -But he wasn't exactly fucking gone. -Language, Phil.
translation.it: Non era esattamente sparito, cazzo. - Modera il linguaggio. - Vero.

translation.en: No, that's correct. He wasn't exactly fucking gone like that.
translation.it: - Modera il linguaggio. - Vero. Non era esattamente sparito, cazzo.

translation.en: -[Angelica] Language, Jed. -Where'd he go, O?
Maybe you shouldn't curse so much in front of the children.
translation.it: Non dire parolacce davanti ai bambini. Allora hai sentito.

translation.en: -Ah, come on. Tell the rest. -[Angelica] This is not a farmyard, boys.
translation.it: Allora hai sentito. Un po' di contegno.

translation.en: So, um, I ask everyone, right?
Everyone's looking around the whole house, everyone frantic,
translation.it: E si misero a cercare in giro per casa,

translation.en: and finally Owen, you know, eventually comes up
and brings me to his room...
translation.it: e mi porta in camera sua...

translation.en: How old were you then, Owen? Like, eight or somethin'?
translation.it: Quanti anni avevi, Owen? Otto, mi sembra?

translation.en: -Nine. -[Jed] Eight or nine, whatever. And he says-- He says,
translation.it: - Nove. - Otto o nove. E dice...

translation.en: "Uh, I have to tell you somethin'. My-- My hawk ate Ernie."
translation.it: ..."Devo dirti una cosa. Il mio falco s'è mangiato Ernie".

translation.en: "What?" And he points over there,
and there's this big fuckin' red-tailed hawk
translation.it: e vedo questo enorme falco coda rossa

translation.en: sitting on his desk staring at me.
translation.it: che mi fissa, appollaiato sulla sua scrivania.

translation.en: What eight-year-old has a fuckin' hawk?
translation.it: Quale bambino di otto anni ha un cazzo di falco?

translation.en: Uh, how did you have a hawk?
translation.it: Come ti sei procurato un falco?

translation.en: Um, I rescued it from the park.
I found it with a broken wing and brought it to my room and fed it.
translation.it: Aveva un'ala spezzata, l'ho portato in camera mia e l'ho nutrito.

translation.en: That was the craziest part. He would feed it, like a mother bird, you know...
translation.it: La cosa assurda è che gli dava da mangiare come una mamma falco...

translation.en: Oh, masticate-- No, no, no. Premasticate.
-Yeah, premastication! -[man] Jed was a chronic masticater.
translation.it: - Sì, premasticando! - Jed era un masticatore cronico.

translation.en: -[Jed] How'd you know? -[man] You can go blind doing that.
How long did you take care of the bird for, Owen?
translation.it: Per quanto tempo ti sei preso cura del falco, Owen?

translation.en: Two or three months, until it was strong enough
translation.it: Due o tre mesi, finché è diventato abbastanza forte

translation.en: to go into Jed's room and eat his gerbil, I guess.
translation.it: da andare in camera di Jed e mangiargli il criceto.

translation.en: But what happened to the hawk?
translation.it: Ma che fine ha fatto il falco?

translation.en: We set it free.
Oh. Okay. [Porter] That reminds me.
Remember when Colby fell in the Gowanus Canal?
translation.it: Ricordate quando Colby cadde nel canale Gowanus?

translation.en: -Remember that day? -[Angelica] Oh, poor Colby.
[Porter] I threw the stick,
-he didn't go for it... -[Angelica] So traumatizing.
translation.it: lui non corse a prenderlo, mi girai e lui...

translation.en: [Adelaide] I told Jed I wouldn't marry him until they painted you in.
translation.it: Ho detto a Jed che non l'avrei sposato finché non ti avessero aggiunto.

translation.en: Maybe that's why we haven't set a date yet.
translation.it: Forse è per questo che non abbiamo ancora fissato la data.

translation.en: They're gonna paint me in.
The artist just took a six-month sabbatical to Nepal,
translation.it: L'artista sta passando un periodo sabbatico di sei mesi in Nepal,

translation.en: to study the light.
I lost my job.
I'm sorry, Owen.
It's okay, I'll find a new one.
translation.it: Non fa niente, ne troverò un altro.

translation.en: I'm actually thinking about becoming... a temporary volunteer husband.
translation.it: Sto addirittura pensando di diventare un marito volontario temporaneo.

translation.en: You're not serious.
Get rid of my lease, bounce from widow to widow.
Do you ever notice that your plans always involve starting over...
translation.it: Hai notato che i tuoi progetti comportano sempre ripartire da zero,

translation.en: often with an entirely new identity?
It's a good fantasy.
[Angelica] Pudding's upstairs by the fireplace, everyone.
translation.it: Il dessert è servito al piano di sopra, accanto al caminetto.

translation.en: Just to get through the post-dinner conversation.
translation.it: Giusto per affrontare la conversazione post-cena.

translation.en: Think about it.
Seriously...
as a hypothetical.
Say you and I left, right? Tonight.
translation.it: Se io e te ce ne andassimo, stanotte?

translation.en: I got us passports, new identities.
You steal all the money from Jed's bank account.
translation.it: Tu prelevi tutti i soldi dal conto bancario di Jed.

translation.en: We just... do that.
We get a house in the middle of nowhere.
translation.it: Ci prendiamo una casa in un posto sperduto.

translation.en: Start again.
Different people.
Are we a married couple?
We don't...
We can be, you know...
We don't have to be. We could be brother, or sister, or... friends.
translation.it: Non è necessario. Possiamo essere fratello e sorella, o... amici.

translation.en: So... tonight, then, after dessert?
I'm serious. Let's do it.
You're fucking with me.
I got you.
You believed me.
This week's gonna be a living hell for me.
He'll totally win.
He's not guilty. No chance of a conviction.
translation.it: Non è colpevole. Non potranno condannarlo.

translation.en: It's all just so humiliating.
I mean, it's been going on for fucking ages,
translation.it: Questa cazzo di storia va avanti da una vita,

translation.en: all just for one day in court.
translation.it: e solo per un giorno in tribunale.

translation.en: Because he didn't do it, so...
translation.it: Perché non ha commesso il fatto, quindi...

translation.en: You're positive?
Right? You were actually with him?
Yes.
[Phil] You would make that move.
translation.it: - Tu faresti quella mossa. - Che significa?

translation.en: -[man 1] What does that even mean? -[Phil] You would make that move. [man 2] That's the move--
Hey, Owen, you're not trying to sneak off, are you?
translation.it: Owen, non starai cercando di svignartela, vero?

translation.en: No, Dad.
I need a second of your time before you leave.
translation.it: Concedimi un istante, prima di andar via.

translation.en: Come on, boys, it's time.
[all] Balderdash!
-[Angelica] Owen, you're staying to play. -No, I-- I have to go.
translation.it: Owen, devi partecipare. No, devo andare. Ho qualcosa...

translation.en: -I have something... -[Angelica] You love Balderdash.
No, I don't.
Come on, stay, it will be fun.
I have a fundamental problem with Balderdash.
translation.it: Ho un serio problema con Balderdash...

translation.en: I gotta say, what a delicious meal that was.
translation.it: Devo dire che è stata una cena deliziosa.

translation.en: So good, Mom. So good.
-You used to love Balderdash. -Mom, no, I didn't.
translation.it: Ti piaceva tanto Balderdash. - Non è vero. - Chi vuole il gelato?

translation.en: -[Jed] Who wants ice cream? -[children yelling]
translation.it: - Non è vero. - Chi vuole il gelato? Io!

translation.en: -Who wants ice cream? Oh, you do? -I do!
translation.it: - Chi vuole il gelato? Tu? - Io!

translation.en: Of course. But whoever's the quietest gets ice cream, I promise. Mom.
translation.it: Ma certo. A chi fa meno chiasso do il gelato, giuro. Mamma.

translation.en: Oh, are we playing Balderdash, or what?
translation.it: Allora giochiamo a Balderdash oppure no?

translation.en: So, um... [clears throat] I've been considering...
Considering leaving Roosevelt Island?
-No... -[Angelica] Oh, thank God.
So, have Hal help you find something closer.
translation.it: Chiedi a Hal di aiutarti a trovare un posto più vicino.

translation.en: -Oh, you moving closer? -[Owen] I'm not moving closer.
translation.it: - Ti trasferisci vicino a noi? - No.

translation.en: Crazy to think that every word did get invented.
translation.it: Che strano pensare che ogni parola sia stata inventata.

translation.en: I-- I have to go. Goodbye.
-Wait, you're not playing Balderdash? -No, I can't. Bye.
translation.it: - Aspetta, non giochi a Balderdash? - Non posso. Ciao.

translation.en: Oh, Owen, come on, you love Balderdash.
translation.it: - E dai, Owen! Adori Balderdash. - No che non l'adoro, cazzo!

translation.en: No, I don't fucking love Balderdash! Balderdash is bullshit. [clears throat]
translation.it: - E dai, Owen! Adori Balderdash. - No che non l'adoro, cazzo! Balderdash è una cazzata!

translation.en: -Jesus, Owen. -Is he off his meds?
translation.it: - Cristo, Owen. - Ha smesso i farmaci?

translation.en: -[Belle cries] -I'll walk you to the station.
-[Phil] Don't worry about Uncle Owen. -Aggressive.
[Phil] He's a spaz. We're gonna get ice cream now.
translation.it: È un idiota. Adesso mangiamo il gelato.

translation.en: -[Porter] Is it a money crisis? -[Owen] No.
I know it's an expensive apartment to rent, but...
translation.it: So che paghi tanto per l'affitto di quell'appartamento, ma...

translation.en: Have you...? Have you thought about a...? A roommate? No.
translation.it: - Hai pensato di trovarti un coinquilino? - No.

translation.en: I don't know why you won't let us just buy you a place.
translation.it: Non capisco perché non vuoi che ti compriamo un appartamento.

translation.en: That way you'd have more security.
Or you... You could come and work for the company.
translation.it: Oppure potresti venire a lavorare per l'azienda.

translation.en: All your brothers do.
I already agreed, okay?
You don't need to buy me off.
Uh... I don't... I don't follow you. What--?
I will lie for Jed...
next week in court.
I get the expectation.
It's not an expectation, Owen, it's a gift.
translation.it: Non è aspettativa, Owen. È un dono.

translation.en: You are giving your brother the gift of an alibi.
translation.it: Regali a tuo fratello un alibi.

translation.en: This woman is an opportunist. She sees an in.
translation.it: Questa donna è un'opportunista. Vuole approfittarsene.

translation.en: [sighs] You're protecting him.
-You're protecting the family. -Right.
I know, I know, it sounds muddled, but that is the way reality works, Owen.
translation.it: So che sembra confuso, ma la realtà funziona così, Owen.

translation.en: -How's that, Dad? -[poop bot chatters]
With... With adjustments.
Just so you know, I got a new job.
translation.it: Volevo farti sapere che ho un nuovo lavoro.

translation.en: Oh? What...? What job?
Business... marketing.
It involves travel, so I'll be gone a couple days next week,
translation.it: Dovrò viaggiare, e la settimana prossima mi assenterò un paio di giorni,

translation.en: but I'll be back in time for the trial.
translation.it: ma tornerò in tempo per il processo.

translation.en: And... don't worry if you can't reach me.
translation.it: E... non preoccuparti se non riesci a contattarmi.

translation.en: Someone invented a new kind of ham.
translation.it: Hanno creato un nuovo tipo di prosciutto.

translation.en: That's... That's wonderful, Owen.
That's-- That's-- That's great.
Milgrim men, we always come out on top.
translation.it: I maschi dei Milgrim vincono sempre.

translation.en: Anyway...
-All right. -[poop bot chatters]
-[dog whimpers] -[Porter] Hey, Colby, it's a Tristan 500.
-[poop bot] Cleaning in progress. -[Porter] No kicking and licking.
translation.it: - Pulizia in corso. - Non si tocca e non si lecca. NETTEZZA URBANA

translation.en: [woman over PA] Find the end of your rainbow
translation.it: Trova la fine del tuo arcobaleno

translation.en: at Neberdine Pharmaceutical and Biotech.
Psst, buddy. Which one are you here for?
It should be on the form right there.
It says, uh, U.L.P.
Me too.
That's a good one.
It's the big time.
Get ready to make a lot of fuckin' money.
translation.it: Preparati a fare un sacco di soldi.

translation.en: [woman over PA] Carol Cuddy. Carol Cuddy, please report to D.M. test room three
translation.it: Carol Cuddy, si rechi in sala test DM 3

translation.en: for A.E.B Phase I.
translation.it: per la fase I AEB. FASE III TRIAL ULP

translation.en: What do the bombs mean?
High-risk. That's where the dollars come from.
translation.it: Rischio elevato. È da lì che vengono i soldi.

translation.en: Apparently, they're havin' some kind of problem with this new drug.
translation.it: Pare che ci siano dei problemi con un nuovo farmaco.

translation.en: -I think you should let me do it again. -Strong stuff. Very trippy shit.
translation.it: - Me lo lasci ripetere. - Roba forte. Da sballo.

translation.en: -[woman] Who's in charge of the red light? -That doesn't bother you?
translation.it: Chi accende la lucina rossa? Non ti preoccupa?

translation.en: -No. -I don't fucking understand.
-No risk, no reward. -I'm supposed to be part of the trial.
translation.it: - Né rischi, né soldi. - Devo partecipare.

translation.en: -I'm sorry. -This is fucking bullshit.
[woman over PA] Jon Mallard, please report to D.M. test room one.
translation.it: John Mallory, si rechi in sala test DM 1.

translation.en: Jon Mallard, please report to D.M. test room one for Rumi Phase III.
translation.it: John Mallory, si rechi in sala test DM 1 per la Fase III Rumi.

translation.en: [woman] Patricia. Patricia.
-[woman] I have to get into that study. -[second woman] Ma'am?
[woman] You have a daughter. Her name is Usnavy, and she goes to Hunter College.
translation.it: Hai una figlia. Si chiama Usnavy, e va al liceo Hunter.

translation.en: [woman over PA] Owen Milgrim, please report to D.M. test room five.
translation.it: Owen Milgrim, si rechi in sala test DM 5.

translation.en: Owen Milgrim, please report to D.M. test room five for U.L.P. screening.
translation.it: Owen Milgrim, si rechi in sala test DM 5 per l'esame ULP.

translation.en: Steven McDougal, please report to test room eight.
translation.it: Steven McDougal, si rechi in sala test 8.

translation.en: Steven McDougal, please report to test room eight for M.S. One Phase II.
translation.it: Steven McDougal, si rechi in sala test 8 per la Fase II M.S.

translation.en: [Owen] Unnecessary.
[woman] Try to answer with an emotion, rather than a description.
translation.it: Cerchi di rispondere con un'emozione, anziché una descrizione.

translation.en: Uh... calm.
[Owen] Justice.
-Is this personalized somehow? -[woman] No.
Focus on your answers.
-Suffocated. -[woman] Good.
Now, Mr. Milgrim...
please turn your attention to me
as I ask you this final question.
Are you gonna ask it?
-Does that disqualify me? -[machine beeps]
Your defense mechanisms are fungible.
translation.it: I suoi meccanismi di difesa sono fungibili.

translation.en: You've been accepted.
[woman over PA] Find the end of your rainbow
translation.it: Trova la fine del tuo arcobaleno

translation.en: at Neberdine Pharmaceutical and Biotech.
Stop looking at me.
Did...? Did you...?
Did you lose your husband recently?
Did you lose your husband recently?
-[Owen] But I just saw... -Leave me alone.
translation.it: - Ma ho visto... - Lasciami in pace.

translation.en: Do you play golf in Hilton Head?
translation.it: Giochi a golf a Hilton Head?

translation.en: I'll kill you.
I have a gun.
[Patricia over PA] Attention, please, all participants in the U.L.P. Phase III trial,
translation.it: Attenzione, i partecipanti alla Fase III ULP

translation.en: please look at your lanyards.
translation.it: sono pregati di controllare il tesserino.

translation.en: If you are an odd number, please line up at the intake corridor.
translation.it: I numeri dispari si mettano in fila nel corridoio d'accettazione.

translation.en: All even numbers will be next.
It's Jed.
No, it's Grimsson.
Mustache. No, don't say anything. Just be cool.
translation.it: Ho i baffi. Non dire niente.

translation.en: The pattern is the pattern.
The pattern got you here.
translation.it: Lo schema ti ha portato qui.

translation.en: Keep trusting the pattern.
She's your handler now.
translation.it: Lei si occupa di te, ora.

translation.en: She has a certain je ne sais quoi.
translation.it: Ha un certo je ne sais quoi.

translation.en: She's no Olivia, though.
Make contact with her. Use the code phrase.
translation.it: Entra in contatto con lei. Usa la frase in codice.

translation.en: [Patricia over PA] If you are an odd number, please line up at the intake corridor.
translation.it: I numeri dispari si mettano in fila nel corridoio d'accettazione.

translation.en: The pattern is the pattern. I know it doesn't make sense.
translation.it: Lo schema è lo schema. So che non ha alcun senso.

translation.en: It doesn't make sense to me either right now, but it will.
translation.it: Non ha senso nemmeno per me, ora, ma ce l'avrà.

translation.en: Keep going forward.
Just reach out...
and make contact.
[Patricia over PA] All odd numbers, line up by the intake corridor.
translation.it: I numeri dispari si mettano in fila nel corridoio d'accettazione.

translation.en: What the fuck is wrong with you?
Sorry.
Robert, wake up.
The odds are here.
Let us complete this trial with none of the old problems, sir.
translation.it: Completiamo questo trial senza i vecchi problemi.

translation.en: Yes, Dr. Fujita.
None of the old problems.
[orderly] As you enter the common room,
you will notice there are numbers on the pods.
translation.it: vedrete che le cabine sono numerate.

translation.en: The pod numbers correspond with the numbers on your lanyards.
translation.it: I numeri sulle cabine corrispondono a quelli sul vostro tesserino.

translation.en: Please go to your pod.
That will be your home for the duration of your stay here with us.
translation.it: La cabina sarà la vostra residenza durante il vostro soggiorno qui.

translation.en: Leaving your pod at any unauthorized moment
translation.it: Se lasciate la cabina senza autorizzazione

translation.en: will result in the termination of your stay here at this trial,
translation.it: la vostra partecipazione al trial verrà interrotta,

translation.en: as well as bringing shame and humiliation upon you.
translation.it: e ne ricaverete vergogna e umiliazione.

translation.en: Once you reach your pod, an orderly will approach
translation.it: Una volta raggiunta la cabina, un inserviente vi avvicinerà

translation.en: and begin to inspect your bag.
Once the orderly has inspected your bag, you will put your bag in your locker.
translation.it: Al termine dell'ispezione, riponete la borsa nello scomparto.

translation.en: Once you have done that, make your way to this gentleman.
He will give you your uniform,
as well as your patented Neberdine shoes,
which you cannot take with you at the end of the trial.
translation.it: che dovrete restituire al termine del trial.

translation.en: Once you have your uniforms and your shoes,
translation.it: Una volta ricevute scarpe e uniforme,

translation.en: you will make your way back to your pods,
then you will get in your pods and change clothes in your pods.
translation.it: Vi entrerete e vi cambierete al suo interno.

translation.en: There will be no changing in the commons.
translation.it: Non ci si può svestire nella sala comune.

translation.en: Oh, my God!
[orderly] Condoms are contraband.
-Safety first. -[orderly] That's a red flag right there.
translation.it: - La sicurezza innanzitutto. - È un segnale d'allarme.

translation.en: Intimacy in this facility is off-limits.
There will be no cohabitation inside the pods.
translation.it: È proibito coabitare all'interno delle cabine.

translation.en: Once the curfew starts, lights go out.
translation.it: Al momento del coprifuoco, le luci si spegneranno.

translation.en: You're not supposed to be here.
Please.
What are my instructions?
The pattern is the pattern.
You're my contact. What are my instructions?
translation.it: Sei il mio contatto. Quali sono le istruzioni?

translation.en: [whispering] Please turn off the pattern. Please turn off...
-Owen. -[orderly] ..tight schedule.
We will tell you when there is mealtime.
translation.it: Vi diremo quando è l'ora dei pasti.

translation.en: Your instructions are to go back to your pod and await my signal.
translation.it: Le istruzioni sono di tornare in cabina e aspettare il mio segnale.

translation.en: [orderly] ...two Etch A Sketches and one Lite-Brite. Please don't fight over them.
translation.it: Ci sono una lavagna magica e una luminosa. Usatele a turno.

translation.en: I'm going to save the world.
[orderly] We will tell you when there's recreation time.
Yes. You're gonna save the world.
translation.it: - Sì. - E vi diremo anche quando... - Salverai il mondo. - ...sarà ora di dormire.

translation.en: [orderly] ...and we will tell you when to sleep.
translation.it: - Salverai il mondo. - ...sarà ora di dormire.

translation.en: -But not if you blow our cover. -[orderly] ...expecting. Thank you.
translation.it: Ma non far saltare la nostra copertura.

translation.en: Is that working for you?
Okay, I understand.
[orderly] If you're having trouble getting into your pod,
translation.it: Se fate fatica a entrare nella cabina,

translation.en: there is also a little ladder underneath that will help you get into your pod.
Also note, from here on in,
you will be referred to as the number on your lanyard. You are the Odds.
translation.it: sarete chiamati col numero riportato sul tesserino. Voi siete i Dispari.

translation.en: Attention.
Please give your attention to Dr. Muramoto and Dr. Fujita.
translation.it: Prestate attenzione al dottor Muramoto e alla dottoressa Fujita.

translation.en: They will be supervising your trials.
Welcome, subjects.
You made the right choice.
It's time to start your lives again.
translation.it: È ora di ricominciare a vivere, per voi.

translation.en: You don't fuck this up...
translation.it: Tu non manderai tutto a puttane.

translation.en: I won't fuck this up.
translation.it: Io non manderò tutto a puttane.

translation.en: Just kidding.
